name: Wastelander (itch)
description:
Summary of the game

This game is about a you the main protagonist shooting down the Soviet balls and tank(In the newest Version).The original version is my first game it's a decent game but you should play the original version during your free time.But here's some gameplay for the original Wastelander. But the Newer version is the better version it has the latest and cutting edge features and there's 4 maps but there might be DLC coming soon
